lesson: Require explicit self-edit tool calls in task output and execute those calls in review. Narrative-only output must fail the task.

task_feedback: Low-level tool contract was technically correct but too verbose for reliable agent behavior.
lesson: Prefer one elegant interface for self-evolution (getSelfInfo + changeSelfAttrs) and route internally to low-level tools for enforcement and safety.

task_feedback: Quick patches reduced immediate noise but let root cause survive and reappear.
lesson: Do NOT apply bandaids or paper over gaping issues. Trace the failure path end-to-end, fix root cause, and add an enforceable guard to prevent recurrence.
